Comments_List: I learned a lot about basic Latin grammar principles (pretty much all the grammar needed for the whole language), how to translate some material of Caesar and other ancient authors, and learned a lot of vocabulary which before these 5 weeks was completely foreign to me.
in-depth knowledge of Latin grammar, plenty of practice
Professor was extremely helpful. Material could be overwhelming at times but he made an active effort to reduce the stress levels.
I thought this was an excellent course, if a little fast paced. The vocabulary was a little hard to keep up with but I think all the work will pay off.

Very amazing course! Professor Robinson is easily one of the best instructors I have ever had. He clearly and with great enthusiasm presents the course material, keenly providing assistance and clarification whenever requested. An otherwise potentially dull subject area is animated into a thoroughly enjoyable, fantastic experience!
More written assignments to hand in. I felt like it made me really think when I had to translate from English to Latin, as a result, I would have preferred to have more of those assignments
Hard to say how it could be improved
Most definitely. Professor Robinson does a really womderful job of making the class feel relaxed while learning a lot of intense and difficult material at an accelerated pace.
Absolutely! Take this course for the best introduction to learning Latin!

Absolutely, whether it is only a requirement, necessary for your work, or just for fun; you will gain valuable knowledge that will not only give you a knowledge of Latin but will also help you with other languages.
